results.title: My beautiful shwesters
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Adam Barolsky and ACMI
results.brief_description: Adam Barolsky laments the distance he has put between himself and his sisters to find a better life. He tells a tale of deep sorrow and concern for the welfare of the family he has left behind. This Digital Storytelling project was created in partnership with the Jewish Museum of Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Adam Barolsky and ACMI
results.description: Adam Barolsky laments the distance he has put between himself and his sisters to find a better life. results.title: Footprints on the Mountains
results.creator_credit: Denise Mack, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: At age 11 Denise Mack is told secretly by her mother that her heritage isn’t Irish, that her grandfather was Lebanese and her grandmother, Chinese. Through this story, Denise journeys along the path of her ancestry to bring her closer to herself.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Denise Mack, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Jidi
results.creator_credit: Stephen Pascoe, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Stephen Pascoe’s grandfather was diagnosed with cancer, he and his sister decided to preserve his memories by filming an interview with him.

results.title: Hyper-Ballad
results.creator_credit: Firas Massouh, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Firas Massouh’s hunger for travel was started by his father who, as a communist activist, moved to Russia from Syria where he met his wife. With baby in tow, the family began a lifelong journey of travelling, which was continued by Firas when he decided to continue his father’s travels and move to Melbourne.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Firas Massouh, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Firas Massouh’s hunger for travel was started by his father who, as a communist activist, moved to Russia from Syria where he met his wife. With baby in tow, the family began a lifelong journey of travelling, which was continued by Firas when he decided to continue his father’s travels and move to Melbourne.

With baby in tow, the family began a lifelong journey of travelling, which was continued by Firas when he decided to continue his father’s travels and move to Melbourne.

results.title: Hello Darling
results.creator_credit: Mike Helal, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Mike Helal left Lebanon at the height of the war and migrated to Melbourne. Reluctant to leave, Mike started to see the beauty of his new home. Despite this, nothing deters him as he waits to be reunited with his loved one again.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Mike Helal, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Mike Helal left Lebanon at the height of the war and migrated to Melbourne. Reluctant to leave, Mike started to see the beauty of his new home. Despite this, nothing deters him as he waits to be reunited with his loved one again.

results.title: Tripoli Melbourne & Me!
results.creator_credit: Dania Dabliz, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Dania Dabliz’s life in Tripoli was full of fun, friends and parties. When she migrated to Melbourne she wondered if she would find the same things again?

results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Umit Ugur and ACMI

results.title: From a small island to a giant continent : the story of a Cypriot Turk
results.creator_credit: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Ifran Hassan and ACMI
results.brief_description: Ifran Hassan recalls leaving his homeland of Cyprus in 1970 to escape the troubled political climate, his destination, Melbourne where he set out to make a new life for himself and to help improve the lives of others.
results.title_for_label: From a small island to a giant continent : the story of a Cypriot Turk
results.creator_credit_for_label: ACMI Digital Storytelling, Ifran Hassan and ACMI
